events.name: Onam Celebration 2024
events.description: Join us for a grand Onam celebration featuring traditional Kerala food, cultural performances, and games. A family-friendly event filled with music and festivities to celebrate Malayali heritage.

events.name: Malayali Music Night
events.description: A night of soulful Malayalam music featuring popular artists from Kerala. Enjoy live performances of classic hits and modern favorites in an intimate setting.

events.name: Kerala Film Festival
events.description: A weekend festival showcasing the best of contemporary and classic Malayalam cinema. Featuring director Q&A sessions, exclusive screenings, and film discussions.

events.name: Malayali Entrepreneurs Conference
events.description: A networking event for Malayali entrepreneurs and business professionals in the UK. Learn from industry experts, attend workshops, and connect with potential business partners.

events.name: Malayali Food Festival
events.description: Savor the flavors of Kerala with a variety of food stalls serving authentic Malayali dishes. Enjoy live cooking demos and traditional performances while exploring the rich culinary heritage of Kerala.
